name: Central Park
description: A large public park in the heart of Manhattan, offering scenic views and recreational activities.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: One of the world's most famous landmarks, offering panoramic views of Paris.

name: Louvre Museum
description: The world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and other masterpieces.

name: Golden Gate Bridge
description: A famous suspension bridge connecting San Francisco to Marin County.

name: Disneyland
description: A magical amusement park featuring rides, attractions, and Disney characters.

name: Taj Mahal
description: A white marble mausoleum and UNESCO World Heritage Site, built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: An iconic performing arts venue with a unique architectural design.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A historic fortification built to protect China from invasions.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient Roman amphitheater, once used for gladiator fights.

name: Burj Khalifa
description: The tallest building in the world, offering breathtaking city views.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A stunning natural canyon carved by the Colorado River.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, gifted by France to the USA.

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island with whitewashed buildings and stunning sunsets.

name: Niagara Falls
description: One of the most famous and powerful waterfalls in the world.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Incan city located high in the Andes Mountains.

name: Tokyo Tower
description: A communications and observation tower offering stunning views of Tokyo.
